metadata.Title: CVE-2020-27824 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A flaw was found in OpenJPEGâ€™s encoder in the opj_dwt_calc_explicit_stepsizes() function. This flaw allows an attacker who can supply crafted input to decomposition levels to cause a buffer overflow. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to system availability.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-27824` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ghostscript - 9.26~dfsg+0-0ubuntu0.16.04.14
ghostscript-x - 9.26~dfsg+0-0ubuntu0.16.04.14
libgs9 - 9.26~dfsg+0-0ubuntu0.16.04.14
libgs9-common - 9.26~dfsg+0-0ubuntu0.16.04.14
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

libopenjpeg-java - 1:1.5.2-3.1ubuntu0.1~esm2
libopenjpeg5 - 1:1.5.2-3.1ubuntu0.1~esm2
openjpeg-tools - 1:1.5.2-3.1ubuntu0.1~esm2
openjpip-dec-server - 1:1.5.2-3.1ubuntu0.1~esm2
openjpip-server - 1:1.5.2-3.1ubuntu0.1~esm2
openjpip-viewer - 1:1.5.2-3.1ubuntu0.1~esm2
openjpip-viewer-xerces - 1:1.5.2-3.1ubuntu0.1~esm2
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

libopenjp2-7 - 2.1.2-1.1+deb9u6build0.16.04.1
libopenjp2-tools - 2.1.2-1.1+deb9u6build0.16.04.1
libopenjp3d-tools - 2.1.2-1.1+deb9u6build0.16.04.1
libopenjp3d7 - 2.1.2-1.1+deb9u6build0.16.04.1
libopenjpip-dec-server - 2.1.2-1.1+deb9u6build0.16.04.1
libopenjpip-server - 2.1.2-1.1+deb9u6build0.16.04.1
libopenjpip-viewer - 2.1.2-1.1+deb9u6build0.16.04.1
libopenjpip7 - 2.1.2-1.1+deb9u6build0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: blender package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
ghostscript package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '9.26~dfsg+0-0ubuntu0.16.04.14').
insighttoolkit4 package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
openjpeg package in esm-apps/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:1.5.2-3.1ubuntu0.1~esm2').
openjpeg2 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.1.2-1.1+deb9u6build0.16.04.1').
texmaker package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
